data.prayer: Spirit, awaken a burning desire for your presence and intimacy among the 325,500 people living in the county of Karbi Anglong.

data.location_label: Photo from the county of Karbi Anglong, Assam, India
data.section_summary: What beauty can God be thanked for in this photo?

data.prayer: There are 325,500 people living in the county of Karbi Anglong. Only about 3,581 might be believers.
Father, convict the 3,581 believers in Karbi Anglong to be holy and righteous. Inspire them to gather in small groups for accountability and spiritual growth.

Spirit, build the strength and maturity of the local leaders in Karbi Anglong, Assam, India. Show them that faithfulness is better than knowledge. Show them that the Spirit, the Word, and prayer is enough in order to grow and lead.
Jesus, I pray that all the Dura people will remember and turn to you, Lord God. May all the Dura people worship before you. For the kingdom of the Dura people is yours.
Lord of the Harvest, please send out workers into the the county of Karbi Anglong, Assam, India.
data.verse: Then he said to his disciples, “The harvest is plentiful but the workers are few. Ask the Lord of the harvest, therefore, to send out workers into his harvest field.

data.prayer: Jesus, strengthen the church in Karbi Anglong, Assam, India by giving a prophet, as you said you would, who is bold and willing to correct. Lord, may the believers care about holiness as you do.
data.verse: So Christ himself gave the apostles, the prophets, the evangelists, the pastors and teachers, to equip his people for works of service, so that the body of Christ may be built up

data.section_summary:
the county of Karbi Anglong, Assam, India has a population of 325,500.

We estimate Karbi Anglong has 3,581 people who might know Jesus, 3,949 people who might know about Jesus culturally, and 317,970 people who do not know Jesus.

This is 1 believer for every 90 neighbors who need Jesus.

data.prayer: Father, put your Bible in the hands of the 317,970, who are far from you and live in this place.
data.verse: How can a young person stay on the path of purity? By living according to your Word. I seek you with all my heart; do not let me stray from your commands.
